title: Augusta County: Tony Pastor to Annie Harris, July 16, 1863
summary: Pastor writes in the aftermath of a battle defeat, describing deaths and men lost as prisoners. One of those he mentions missing and presumed captured is Franklin Carson. This letter also hints that Pastor was recently at home, perhaps on furlough.
keywords: Battle Description, Camp Life, Death/Casualties, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movements, American Civil War
